0: The room really needs major renovation
The hotel is looking old and in need of some repairs
Pool area in need of refurbishment
However facilities seem to look old and may need renovation
My name Verachai Wangtrakulde081928142At Dusit Hua Hin we checked in1230 afternoon and were taken to non renovate room but I said to their staff I can not accept this room and asked for cancel

Most likely this hotel need to be renovated especially room decoration is out style tv too small to wire the hairdryer inside the wooden box is not practical since the wire is not long enough to use it besides shower temperature is not stable suddenly hot and then changed cold lastly club lounge food is not up to standard not tasty and poor setting compare with other hotels and even worse than Dusit Pataya
but the room is running down and need major renovation
Only downside of a refurb is that the plumbing does not change so the shower flow is just “ OK ”
Lanai rooms are closer to pools but they are ground rooms and not recently refurbished still quite confortable
if rooms are upgraded or renovated then it has the value for 5star
1: we stayed in refurbished connecting rooms on th fourth floor
2: I got superior room which i think it is not renovated for a long time
I remember this hotel as luxurious 10 years ago however the rooms and fixtures look like they have not been updated in 10 years
The room was comfortable but in need of an update which they said was planned for spring of 2019
The room was clean but need a bit of renovation in some aspect like not enough light for reading laundry was nicely cleaned and delivery to room on time
The hotel is over 20 years old however everywhere is kept exceptionally clean and in good repair
This is a great hotel unfortunately it was under a refurbishment when we got there but it was baubles I am going back for Christmas xxx
This property is being renovated and we were told that the renovation will finish before the end of this year
3: Many properties do very well on maintenance including Dusit Thani Hua Hin but what remarkable and outstanding here for years is how they retain and remain providing top of class quality of service
The room refurbishments have improved this hotel hugely
When I booked on the Dusit website it claimed all the rooms had been refurbished – which was important to me as the old rooms were not good
On check in I was advised I had to pay a supplement for a refurbished room
